revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Belkin |model=F9K1102 |revision=v1 |upc=722868817865 |asin=B004N625AA |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG8016G22 |manuf_rev=-AK |est_release_date=04/11/2011 |fcc_date=03/02/2011 |fcc_id=K7SF9K1102V1 |ic_id=3623A-F9K1102V1 |pcb_id=141801620000J |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5358UB0;BCM5358UB0KFBG, HG1049 P20, 112442 N1 W; |cpu1_cspeed=530 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406EM2I-12G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6AB160TSC-5G |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, J2,, unpopulated,, 14-pin header |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5358UB0;BCM5358UB0KFBG, HG1049 P20, 112442 N1 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43236;BCM43236KMLG, HT1102 P20, 117858 6 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Voltage Regulator;Zilltek;LV1484S;;1;,,, Voltage Regulator;Zilltek;LV1482S;;1; |stock_boot=CFE; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.22; |tp_firmware=TomatoUSB, FreshTomato |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=belkin.XXX, belkin.XXX.5GHz |default_ssid_regex=^belkin.[a-f0-9]{3}$,,, ^belkin.[a-f0-9]{3}.5GHz$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |oui=08:86:3B |oui_eth=08:86:3B }} {{TagLine|N600 DB Wireless Dual-Band N+ Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Belkin|vs_id_old=5857}} A triangular ''RoHS'' logo / indicator and "P/N: 141801620000J R01" :is silkscreened on one F9K1102v1's board (date code ''1107''). The USB ID of the on-board BCM43236 is 0a5c:bd17. The default SSID pattern is '''belkin.XXX''' (and also [probably] '''belkin.XXX.5GHz''') where '''XXX''' :is the last three hex digits of the wireless interface MAC address (lower case letters). An example SSID is '''belkin.548''' where the WLAN MAC is 08:86:3B:90:35:48. ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.linksysinfo.org/index.php?threads/belkin-f9k1102-tomato-bring-up.70850/ Belkin F9K1102: Tomato bring-up] ===Serial=== ====Pinout==== 
J3
(GND)
(RxD)
(TxD)
[3.3v]
